hopobject.name: BeagleLAB
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-GB; rv:1.9.0.13) Gecko/2009073022 Firefox/3.0.13 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729)
hopobject.body:
A PC free host providing a development environment based on beagle board (running ubuntu 9.04 or later)
Host environment with software applications and hardware interfaces to substitute oscilloscope, multimeter & logic analyzers
GNOME widgets (software apps) & Linux device drivers for capturing data and visualization
Legacy ports like the serial, parallel ports for device interfacing and control
Making an embedded developer's life easier and workbench neater
hopobject.shortdesc: BeagleLAB is an Embedded developer's workbench comprising of must-have hardware/software utilities.
